Just for Meeting with Us, Get a Free3 6‑month Heating & Cooling Repair Essentials Plan from Direct Energy!
Meet with a Direct Energy Solar consultant for an in‑home consultation by September 15, 2015 and receive a free 6‑month Heating & Cooling Repair Essentials Plan.
Your 6-month Plan Includes: - No service visit charge, no deductibles, no age restrictions - $500 coverage per repair incident up to $2,000 annually - 24/7 emergency service
Get started today by calling us at (844) 9-SOLAR-7 to schedule your consultation before these offers expire on September 15, 2015.
Call Us: 844-9-SOLAR-7 Your Sun. Your Power. Your Way.
You’re receiving this email because you’ve expressed interest in a Direct Energy Solar system installation. (1) Offer valid for qualifying homes that sign a new solar system contract with Direct Energy Solar between August 16, 2015–September 15, 2015. No extensions will be granted. For customers who purchase their system, they will receive a $1,000 discount off the contract price at the time of their purchase. For lease customers, $1,000 discount can be applied as a down payment to reduce their monthly solar fees. Minimum system size is 4 kW. Qualifying homes must be located in a territory that Direct Energy Solar serves. Offer not valid with any other promotions, discounts, or special community pricing programs. Only one discount offer per household.
(2) For systems with signed contracts between August 16, 2015–September 15, 2015, if Direct Energy Solar fails to install your solar system and/or your solar system does not pass electrical inspection by December 31, 2015, you will receive a $500 rebate or deduction from final invoice. The number of days due to the following potential delays not caused by Direct Energy Solar will be added to the applicable timeframe: customer scheduling conflicts, structural issues, roof replacements, tree removal, utility transformer issues, and HOA delays. Ground mounts, non-standard roof mounts, commercial systems, leased systems, and systems over 15 kW are excluded. The timeframe begins on the day Direct Energy Solar receives a signed contract and deposit payment (if applicable) for the system. Offer not valid with any other promotions, discounts, or special community pricing programs. Only one discount offer per household.
(3) Meet with a Direct Energy Solar consultant for an in-home consultation between August 16, 2015–September 15, 2015 and receive a free 6-month trial of our Heating & Cooling Repair Essentials Plan. No extensions will be granted. An in-home consultation is contingent on your home passing a qualifying process for solar and your home being located in a territory where Direct Energy Solar completes in-home consultations. The Direct Energy Heating & Cooling Repair Essentials Plan (the “Plan”) is provided by Home Warranty of America, Inc., a Direct Energy company. Not available in all states. There is a 30-day waiting period before coverage begins (giving you 5 months of coverage). The Plan is only free for the initial term of 6 months. Plan value is $101.94 ($16.99 per month for 6 months). Terms and conditions apply. Supplies are limited. Offer not valid with any other promotions, discounts, or special community pricing programs. Only one offer per household.
Offers and financing are not available in all areas. We customize our solar power system specifically for your home, therefore, pricing, savings, utility bill, solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on different factors including but not limited to your location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates. See terms and conditions for more details.
